name: One Man Bandit Prototype
description:
This is a prototype for a top down crime game. The game is focused around paying off a £500,000 underworld debt, to that end the player will be given a large amount of freedom with them being able to make the money in any way they want. However they will have to meet the sixth month deadline and keep in mind the law who will be watching your every move.

The prototype acts as a demonstration of the basic gameplay loop of robbing a bank ingame as well as the art style of the game.

A document containing more in depth information on the gameplay & what I would need to complete the project is contained within the zip file along with the prototype.

Please send any questions you have to unit02games@outlook.com
